metadata.title: CVE-2020-35766 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The test suite in libopendkim in OpenDKIM through 2.10.3 allows local users to gain privileges via a symlink attack against the /tmp/testkeys file (related to t-testdata.h, t-setup.c, and t-cleanup.c). NOTE: this is applicable to persons who choose to engage in the "A number of self-test programs are included here for unit-testing the library" situation.

criterions.comment: opendkim package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
